subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|广|比|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=house that is built to depend on a cliff}}.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) proscribes the use of the pronunciation {{m|cmn|pì}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|包庇|外交庇護|大庇|庇佑|庇短|庇蔭|庇護|庇護權|庇賴|庇身|庇陰|廕庇|政治庇護|曲庇|祐庇|福庇|蔭庇|覆庇之恩|託庇|護庇|門庇}}
